attributes.action: Abandon ideas of building a huge mosque in East London. The £100m should be used to build hospitals where everyone can be treated, not the few.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abandon ideas of building a huge mosque in East London. The £100m should be used to build hospitals where everyone can be treated, not the few."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16611


Prime Minister's Office
